body_html:
Thank you very much,

Along with that, I can show me how or change the codes somehow that I can feed custom arguments to the graph that differs during training mode and inference mode. For example, dropout and batch norm behaves differently between two modes, or tf.cond(is_training, true_fn, false_fn).
body_text:
Thank you very much,
Along with that, I can show me how or change the codes somehow that I can feed custom arguments to the graph that differs during training mode and inference mode. For example, dropout and batch norm behaves differently between two modes, or tf.cond(is_training, true_fn, false_fn).
body:
Thank you very much,

Along with that, I can show me how or change the codes somehow that I can feed custom arguments to the graph that differs during training mode and inference mode. For example, dropout and batch norm behaves differently between two modes, or `tf.cond(is_training, true_fn, false_fn)`.
